## problem remains
不支持
`Filesystem::getVisibility()`


## @dev <small>with something new~</small>
```
composer require aobozhang/aliyun-oss-adapter:@dev
```

#### recently work:
> surport **latest** aliyuncs/oss-sdk-php **~2.0**
>
> 可运行于 **其他框架**


#### optimize:
>`Storage::append();`
>`Storage::prepend();`
>`Filesystem::update();`
>`Filesystem::updateStream;`
>
> **不再删除** 对象后写入，而是直接覆盖
